title:
On a generalized Monge-Amp\`ere equation on closed almost K\"ahler
  surfaces
authors: Ken Wang, Zuyi Zhang, Tao Zheng, Peng Zhu
abstract:
We show the existence and uniqueness of solutions to a generalized
Monge-Amp\`{e}re equation on closed almost K\"ahler surfaces, where the
equation depends only on the underlying almost K\"ahler structure. As an
application, we prove Donaldson's conjecture for tamed almost complex
4-manifolds.
